widget.name: Dinner Decision
widget.description: Dinner Decision helps you and your friends, family, or coworkers come to an agreement on where you should go to dinner (or lunch or breakfast). Start by searching for nearby restaurants or entering your own list of restaurants. Then, each person will be asked in turn to vote on the restaurants. Finally, Dinner Decision will select the restaurant that is most wanted by everyone who participated.
widget.author: Moubry Mobile, Inc.
